posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content:
I was checking out PAL26/MK9/SD5 builds in the search engine and saw that a few people suggested Pal26/Rog14 as a better option, but I've seen none on the engine and am having trouble creating one.

PvM 

Level 40

Human or Elf

Sword & Board

Dex archery

Finessable weapon - Rapier by default

+5 environment

Divine magic caster

GOODIES - Epic Dodge by level 33, AB in the 40s

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
This is not the same as you asked, but I did have a dex-based Pally lying around which you can use as a basis to construct your own:

Paladin(17), Champion of Torm(10), Rogue(13), Human

STR: 14
DEX: 16 (28)
CON: 8
WIS: 14
INT: 10
CHA: 14 (18)

Human: (Quick to Master)
01: Paladin(1): Weapon Finesse, Power Attack
02: Paladin(2): {Smite Evil}

25: Champion of Torm(9)

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
I have a couple of paladin/rogue halfling builds dual-wielding daggers. But here is a human one that should fit the bill. Not very charismatic, but stealthy and with trap skills.

Paladin(26), Rogue(14), Human

STR: 14
DEX: 15 (30)
CON: 12
WIS: 14
INT: 14
CHA: 8

01: Rogue(1): Knockdown, Expertise
02: Paladin(1)

04: Paladin(3): DEX+1, (DEX=16)
05: Paladin(4)
06: Paladin(5): Weapon Focus: Rapier
07: Paladin(6)
08: Rogue(2): DEX+1, {Evasion}, (DEX=17)
09: Paladin(7): Improved Knockdown
10: Paladin(8)

12: Paladin(10): DEX+1, Blind Fight, (DEX=18)
13: Rogue(3): {Uncanny Dodge I}

17: Paladin(14)
18: Rogue(4): Improved Critical: Rapier

20: Paladin(16): DEX+1, (DEX=20)
21: Paladin(17): Epic Weapon Focus: Rapier
22: Rogue(5)
23: Rogue(6)

25: Paladin(18)

29: Paladin(19)

35: Paladin(22)

37: Paladin(24)
38: Paladin(25)
39: Paladin(26): Great Dexterity V, Epic Prowess, (DEX=29)
40: Rogue(14): DEX+1, (DEX=30)
